scripts.compile: sass --load-path=node_modules --style compressed --source-map src/scss/rebranding.scss dist/css/bootstrap.min.css && mkdir -p dist/js dist/fonts && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js dist/js/ && cp src/fonts/* dist/fonts/
scripts.compile:dev: sass --load-path=node_modules src/scss/rebranding.scss dist/css/bootstrap.css && mkdir -p dist/js dist/fonts && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js dist/js/ && cp src/fonts/* dist/fonts/
